main event: A sighting of a circular object with a plastic dome and a very bright light in Altoona, PA.
interesting points: The object appeared for about 3 seconds before disappearing., The object had a diameter of 25-30 feet., A very cold breeze originated from the object., The sighting lasted for a total of 5 seconds., The conclusions suggested it was probably a balloon.
sighted object: one circular object with a plastic dome
